name: Bottles (zrrz111, Wollemo)
description:
A game about sharing messages in a bottle between players. Answer the prompts and share as intimately as you like while reading prompts that others shared with the world.

We wanted to make a game that expressed how we deal with depression and anxiety and we came to the conclusion that talking and writing about our problems helps us tackle them. 

As a team, we turned that concept into an interactive experience with our game where you can take a prompt and share it with other players. You can also collect players' bottles and read their prompts to gain a different person's point of view. 

It's a game about discussing tough topics and sharing them with people in hopes to show support and expressing yourself.
